author: Paul O'Mara
comment: I like this watch face a lot, but the color still resets despite the last update stating that it was fixed.

author: Nafees Ansari
comment: To access setting for this app on phone, open android wear app and then watch faces and its setting will be shown there

author: Silas Murer
comment: How can i open this app on the phone? And the meter isnt showing on my watch?!

author: Sougat Garai
comment: Gorgeous watch! 2 suggestions!  1. An option to switch between the white background by day and the black one at night!  2. An option to randomize between some preselectable colors (5/7 should be enough) everytime I tilt to view! Will keep the novelty factor going.. Will keep it fresh!   Great work Florian! Yummy material design goodness! 😍 Thanx so much. This is now my default watch face!

author: Dalwinder Randhawa
comment: Like the face. Would be perfect if there is time separation like hr:mm

author: Nathan R. Rohde
comment: Seconds on bottom don't work.  Just shows a solid color

author: Jonathan Ohlsson
comment: Love the look of it! It has a bug when it gets a notification in ambient mode, it starts using color again until you bring it out of ambient. It really drains the battery life if you don't dismiss notifications right away.

author: George Skevas
comment: Only issues are that the colors reset when coming out of a menu or ambiant mode and that the seconds totally disappear leaving only a solid block of color.

author: Marko Cekić
comment: its one of the cooler wwtch faces i've used but it has a bug when going into the app drawer the seconds tab just disappears and it shows the collor only

author: NYQWZN
comment: Nice app

author: Daragh F
comment: Installed, but can't see icon, or as an option on the phone or in the wear app!

author: Mayur Madnani
comment: Love the watch face. I would really appreciate if background colors goes to night mode automatically

author: Joshua Huggins
comment: Great looking Watch face but kept disappearing from my moto 360.

author: Hunter Jorschumb
comment: Can't change the colors or features to do so besides on the watch.

author: Vincent lai
comment: Simple and beautiful. Smooth animation of seconds to the left.

author: Mohammed Rampurawala
comment: Simply Loved It. Sleek and Elegant.

author: Zaff Zaidi
comment: Fantastic watch face!

author: smr murad777
comment: Rate 5 Stars

author: Alex Chai
comment: A good watch face, but still some overall issues.  When you get a notification and stay on the card, when going into ambient mode, the watch face glitches and stays on the regular watch face frozen until you tap the screen of glance at the watch.  Ambient mode is broken on this watch face so pls fix it and it will be my #1 face

reply.author: Florian Möhle
reply.content: Has been fixed and the update is rolling out now :)

author: Alex Scriba
comment: Looks great, but glitches sometimes when going into the settings on the phone where the colours change from what I set them. Other than that it's great. Simple easy to read, stylish and not very power hungry.

author: Greg Loesch
comment: Color settings reset to white/orange after awhile. Going in to the settings shows the colors still as what I chose. Please fix!  Watch face look is great overall, though.

reply.author: Florian Möhle
reply.content: Has been fixed and the update is rolling out now :)

title: Watch settings keep resetting

author: Gérson M.
comment: Please allow the option to turn off seconds. It glitches and sometimes when it's on the seconds go blank and lags when you scroll through notifications when swiping up to view them.
title: Seconds on and off

author: Brandon Graham
comment: Looks very nice, but the font changes slightly when transitioning to ambient mode. I have not seen that on other watch faces. I'll keep it installed and hope for an update. Until then, I will use something else.

reply.author: Florian Möhle
reply.content: Yes, that's what it's supposed to do to fit the ambient style better! :)

author: Evan Sims
comment: The seconds sometimes so up and sometimes don't, just showing a colored bar. Uninstalled.
title: Seconds disappear

author: Spencer Tillman
comment: Closest watch face to material design. I love it! P.S. allow all colors for time and background.
title: Timr Face

author: Jan Polášek
comment: I would use it, but there's a bug that when I swipe up for cards and then back to watch face, the seconds indicator is missing and there's just colored strip. Otherwise it's very beautiful

author: Frank Johnson
comment: Great for me but please give option to increase size of font/day/date/battery % and also to delete am/pm and put phone battery % in its place
title: Almost

author: Benjamin Crosnier
comment: Nicely done, but there doesn't seem to be a way to access the background settings from the watch face settings (long press to watch face list/settings), and there is no accessible launcher activity.
title: No background settings

author: Владислав Глаголев
comment: When I open the apps menu and close it
title: Scale disappears

author: Aman Chuwan
comment: I may try a lot different other watch faces but this one will always remain my favorite. Covers the flat tire of moto 360 perfectly.
title: My favorite

comment: I have installed it but cannot find in my menu or widgets bar

reply.author: Florian Möhle
reply.content: Are you trying to use it as a phone widget?

comment: Not showing secs on sony smart watch

comment: Awesome one less star. Because the color of the face keeps changing for itself

reply.content: This might be fixed in the current update! Please check again! :)

comment: Just wish we had a color picker for the background too. Otherwise, a beautiful minimalistic watch face
title: Works nicely
